snippet: The Equation of Time accounts for the difference between clock time and solar time, and why after the winter solstice the sunrise keeps getting later even as days start to get longer.
abstract: Astronomical formula Equation of Time accounts for the difference between clock time and solar time, complex phenomenon that causes later sunrises after the winter solstice even as days lengthen.
lead_paragraph: The Equation of Time accounts for the difference between clock time and solar time, and why after the winter solstice the sunrise keeps getting later even as days start to get longer.

headline.seo: Elliptical Answers to Why Winter Mornings Are So Long
headline.main: Equation of Time Solves Mystery of Gray Mornings
headline.print_headline: Equation of Time Solves Mystery of Gray Mornings
